name: Web Explorer by Shed Head Studios
name_original: Web Explorer by Shed Head Studios
description:
I am aware that there are a few check point bugs throughout the game that can occur randomly (if you fall to your death in specific areas).

Chris Lomax - Designer (Level Design, Mechanics, Blueprints, Animation, UI Systems & Play Testing) 

Dan Jolley - 3D Modelling & Play Testing 

Ryan Chaney - Technical Designer (Blueprints) & Play Testing 

Abby MacFarlane - Sound

Eloise Welsh - Concept Art

Debby Brady - Generalist (QA) & Writer 

This was a university group project we were given for our final assignment in second year at UCLAN which lasted 7 weeks.
